name: Groasis
description:
Groasis is a third-person, open-world survival game. In this game you find yourself alone in a vast dystopian desert. You'll have to use the resources you find to make sure you survive as you traverse the harsh landscape around you. Gather and build to help get through the desert.

Let yourself be immersed in this atmospheric single-player experience. Lean back, strategize on what you need to survive and start exploring!

Features
  • Explore at your own pace; traverse the procedurally generated, dust filled, desolate desert.
  • Learn to gather resources and use these to craft new items to aid in your adventure and survival.
Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Mouse - Camera
  • LMB (Left Mouse Button) - Action
  • RMB (Right Mouse Button) - Eat/Place Object
  • E - Pickup/Interact
  • Q - Drop
  • B - Vehicle
  • I - Inventory/Crafting Menu
  • 0-9 - Item Slots
  • ESC - Menu
System Requirements
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel® iCore™ i5 6600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphic: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 960
